column7: probably the best lunch restaurant in the city
column9: Nice located in the absolutely city centre. Excellent lunch including soup Monday-Friday. The food is very good and very friendly staff as well. It s also possible to arrange dinners and events there

You can go here for lunch monday - friday during the student semester. Great lunch at an affordable price. But if you want to have a larger party this is also a good place to go. Often the students have their 500 person sit-down dinners...More
Beautiful building but few choice of food. Nice broccoli soup, but the main dish was too salty and full of different tastes

I eat lunch here quite often, I tend to come back here because its really good value for the money. Food is always delicious, and with a "twist", they dont slack:) Also, I love the location and the room is so beautiful.
Maten är helt ok, dock endast några få rätter att välja på var dag, men det är väl inte i...More

Var här med kollegorna från arbetsplatsen. Maten var sen. Kall, Tråkig. Desserten oätlig. Personalen verkade väldigt stressad.

Fantastisk kvalité på luncherna (i förhållande till priset 88:-). Jättegott hembakat surdegsbröd är en enorm bonus!
Alltid en god vegetarisk rätt och soppa och gott bröd. Salladen är helt ok men inte jättemycket att välja mellan.
